card1.title: Build custom workflows in minutes
card1.description: Automate the busywork, so you can focus on your job, not your tools. We'll show you how.

card2.title: Get more power from your tools
card2.description: Integrate your critical work apps into workflows, reclaim your time, and focus on impactful work.

card3.title: Connect the apps you already love
card3.description: Zapier supports more apps than any other platform, so you can optimize the tools you use.

makeSure.part1: To ensure the automation works correctly, make sure it's

actions.AddToPlaylist: Automatically adds a song to a designated playlist.
actions.UploadToDrive: Auto-uploads files to Google Drive when triggered.

triggers.LikeSong: Fires when a song is liked on platforms like YouTube, Spotify.
triggers.NewAttachment: Triggers upon receiving new file attachments in emails.
triggers.NewFile: Triggers when new file is added to Drive
triggers.TodayEvent: Triggers when a calendar event is on the current day.
triggers.UpcomingEventsTeams: Triggers when upcoming events on Teams
triggers.UpcomingEventsCalendar: Triggers when upcoming events on Google Calendar
triggers.NewVideo: Fires when a channel that the user has subscribed to uploads a new video.

services.google_drive: Google Drive lets you store and access your files anywhere â€” on the web, on your hard drive, or on the go
services.google_calendar: A time-management and scheduling calendar service.
services.gmail: A free email service developed by Google. Users can access Gmail on the web and using third-party programs that synchronize email content through POP or IMAP protocols.
services.spotify: A digital music streaming service that gives you access to millions of songs, podcasts, and videos from artists all over the world.
services.youtube: A platform that allows users to upload, view, rate, share, and comment on videos.
services.teams: Microsoft Teams is a unified communication and collaboration tool.
